title: NativeScript
content:
Prevent width of **Label** to strech
```
horizontal-align: left;
```

<hr>

icon
```
ns resources generate icons  ../myIcon.png
ns resources generate splashes ../myImage.png --background "#FF00FF"
```

<hr>
max console.log limit

```
android: {
    maxLogcatObjectSize: 204800
},
```
